lines.text:
[getting in a tourist's face]
I live here, asshole!
We're gonna smoke a J. You're welcome to partake. Us with.

[spinning his father's wheelchair around in the middle of the grocery store]
I like meat! I like meat! I like meat! I like meat!

I had it. The white picket fence life. Good family. Good friends. Good life. Then my dad blew it. Screwed himself up in a car accident. My mom couldn't take it, so she split... taking most of our money with her. I was kinda depressed for awhile, but now I'm doin' all right.
You mean will he turn your ass in?
Shit, I'd say so. I would.
